1   package com.github.jmkgreen.morphia.mapping.cache;
2   
3   // note that it is not threadsafe, currently it does not need to be.
4   public class EntityCacheStatistics {
5       int entities;
6       int hits;
7       int misses;
8   
9       @Override
10      public String toString() {
11          return this.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + entities + " entities, " + hits + " hits, " + misses + " misses.";
12      }
13  
14      public void reset() {
15          entities = 0;
16          hits = 0;
17          misses = 0;
18      }
19  
20      public EntityCacheStatistics copy() {
21          EntityCacheStatistics copy = new EntityCacheStatistics();
22          copy.entities = entities;
23          copy.hits = hits;
24          copy.misses = misses;
25          return copy;
26      }
27  }
